org.jhove2.module.digest
Class AbstractBufferDigester

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.digest.AbstractBufferDigester
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable, BufferDigester, DigesterAlgorithm
Direct Known Subclasses:
MD2Digester, MD5Digester, SHA1Digester, SHA256Digester, SHA384Digester, SHA512Digester
@Persistent
public abstract class AbstractBufferDigester
extends AbstractReportable
implements BufferDigester

Abstract JHOVE2 algorithm-specific message digester that operates on a Java NIO ByteBuffer.

Author:
mstrong, slabrams
